title: Get `No prank in progress to stop` on test run for `changePrank()`
body:
### Component

Forge

### Have you ensured that all of these are up to date?

- [X] Foundry
- [X] Foundryup

### What version of Foundry are you on?

forge 0.2.0 (dffdfde 2023-08-14T00:22:15.788827000Z)

### What command(s) is the bug in?

forge test

### Operating System

macOS (Apple Silicon)

### Describe the bug

Actually erroring started when I tried to use `changePrank()` function. For this kind of test:
```solidity
// SPDX-License-Identifier: UNLICENSED
pragma solidity >=0.8.19 <0.9.0;

import "forge-std/Test.sol";
import { Events } from "../../utils/Events.sol";
import { Errors } from "src/libraries/Errors.sol";
import { Profiles } from "src/Profiles.sol"; 


contract Profiles_Test is Test, Events {
    Profiles internal ggProfilesContract;

    function setUp() internal {
        changePrank(makeAddr("Admin"));
        ggProfilesContract = new Profiles(makeAddr("Admin"));
    }
}
```

I get this kind of output for running tests with `forge test`:
```
2023-08-14T09:54:57.204116Z ERROR forge::runner: setUp failed reason="No prank in progress to stop" contract=0x7fa9385be102ac3eac297483dd6233d62b3e1496
2023-08-14T09:54:57.204116Z ERROR forge::runner: setUp failed reason="No prank in progress to stop" contract=0x7fa9385be102ac3eac297483dd6233d62b3e1496

Running 1 test for test/integration/basic/Quest.t.sol:Quest_Test
[FAIL. Reason: Setup failed: No prank in progress to stop] setUp() (gas: 0)
Test result: FAILED. 0 passed; 1 failed; 0 skipped; finished in 3.32ms

Running 1 test for test/integration/basic/QuestFactory.t.sol:QuestFactory_Test
[FAIL. Reason: Setup failed: No prank in progress to stop] setUp() (gas: 0)
Test result: FAILED. 0 passed; 1 failed; 0 skipped; finished in 3.29ms

Running 8 tests for test/integration/basic/BundleWallet.t.sol:BundleWallet_Test
[FAIL. Reason: No prank in progress to stop] test_AssociateWallet() (gas: 95076)
[FAIL. Reason: No prank in progress to stop] test_DisassociateWallet() (gas: 95165)
[FAIL. Reason: No prank in progress to stop] test_RevertAssociateWalletWhen_AlreadyAssociated() (gas: 92915)
[FAIL. Reason: No prank in progress to stop] test_RevertAssociateWalletWhen_WrongSecondaryWallet() (gas: 18049)
[FAIL. Reason: No prank in progress to stop] test_RevertAssociateWalletWhen_WrongSender() (gas: 18614)
[FAIL. Reason: No prank in progress to stop] test_RevertAssociateWalletWhen_WrongSignature() (gas: 22569)
[FAIL. Reason: No prank in progress to stop] test_RevertDisassociateWalletWhen_NotAssociated() (gas: 17055)
[FAIL. Reason: No prank in progress to stop] test_RevertDisassociateWalletWhen_WrongSender() (gas: 95077)
Test result: FAILED. 0 passed; 8 failed; 0 skipped; finished in 6.12ms
Ran 3 test suites: 0 tests passed, 10 failed, 0 skipped (10 total tests)

Failing tests:
Encountered 8 failing tests in test/integration/basic/BundleWallet.t.sol:BundleWallet_Test
[FAIL. Reason: No prank in progress to stop] test_AssociateWallet() (gas: 95076)
[FAIL. Reason: No prank in progress to stop] test_DisassociateWallet() (gas: 95165)
[FAIL. Reason: No prank in progress to stop] test_RevertAssociateWalletWhen_AlreadyAssociated() (gas: 92915)
[FAIL. Reason: No prank in progress to stop] test_RevertAssociateWalletWhen_WrongSecondaryWallet() (gas: 18049)
[FAIL. Reason: No prank in progress to stop] test_RevertAssociateWalletWhen_WrongSender() (gas: 18614)
[FAIL. Reason: No prank in progress to stop] test_RevertAssociateWalletWhen_WrongSignature() (gas: 22569)
[FAIL. Reason: No prank in progress to stop] test_RevertDisassociateWalletWhen_NotAssociated() (gas: 17055)
[FAIL. Reason: No prank in progress to stop] test_RevertDisassociateWalletWhen_WrongSender() (gas: 95077)

Encountered 1 failing test in test/integration/basic/Quest.t.sol:Quest_Test
[FAIL. Reason: Setup failed: No prank in progress to stop] setUp() (gas: 0)

Encountered 1 failing test in test/integration/basic/QuestFactory.t.sol:QuestFactory_Test
[FAIL. Reason: Setup failed: No prank in progress to stop] setUp() (gas: 0)

Encountered a total of 10 failing tests, 0 tests succeeded
```

I'm using 
- `forge-std` v1.3.0
- `forge` v0.2.0

I would appreciate any help to resolve this issue, Thanks!

`changePrank()` works only if you have an existing prank since it calls `stopPrank(),` which will do a hard revert when no prank is in progress. so i would suggest you could use either `startPrank()` or `prank()` which would resolve your issue.

An interesting thing is that this test is written by another dev in our repo, and he had not any problems with that. Any ideas why it could happen? 

As https://github.com/foundry-rs/foundry/issues/4835 suggests, could it be the difference in `forge` versioning?

It probably is forge versioning issues @vladikopl01 — for this use case I'd recommend using `vm.startPrank` which will work as you want.

Closing—not a bug, but expected behavior
